author: kai-wolf81
name: Zaphyr-Dark
description:
A futuristic dark OS complete theme for GTK, Metacity & Cinnamon, based on many others themes and inspired on all of the systems that I've saw on movies like Hitman 47, VICE,  IronMan, Minority Report, Spy, Doom, etc...
 
Bugs were fixed, Wallpapers, default font theme & sounds are included to make the theme complete, for example you can also replace the sound for the opening & closing windows, just go to System Settings > Sounds > Sound Effects & use the ones included on this theme or the one you prefere.
Recommended icon theme: Shadow-Master, Shadow or Numix circle.

I hope you enjoy it!A futuristic dark OS complete theme for GTK, Metacity & Cinnamon, based on many others themes and inspired on all of the systems that I've saw on movies like Hitman 47, VICE,  IronMan, Minority Report, Spy, Doom, etc...

 
Bugs were fixed, Wallpapers, default font theme & sounds are included to make the theme complete, for example you can also replace the sound for the opening & closing windows, just go to System Settings > Sounds > Sound Effects & use the ones included on this theme or the one you prefere.
Recommended icon theme: Shadow-Master, Shadow or Numix circle.
